description:
Compute node failed to create vm instance on launching command  openstack server create.

[admin@controller ~]$ openstack server create --flavor m1.tiny --image cirros \
>   --nic net-id=1aabac77-e3d1-4f4c-bfa0-dc32d24c0776 --security-group default \
>   --key-name mykey selfservice-instance

Error:
title: Compute node failed to create vm instance on launching command  openstack server create

Error:
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~amitchandpurkar

comments.content:
MessagingTimeout is most of the time due to a configuration error where the request from the API is not able to go to the compute node for creating the instance, hence the error (because the message queue is maybe not there, or because the creds are not good, etc.)

Please make sure your configuration is okay (and please use nova list for checking, insteand of openstackclient) and in case you think it's not a deployment issue, please modify back that bug report state to New.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sylvain-bauza
